Title: Honeywell progresses spin-off plans
Summary: USA: Honeywell has progressed plans to spin off its Advanced Materials business this year, filing its Form 10 registration statement and announcing its future board for the new Solstice business.

Title: Carrier enables 2-week delivery of R454B
Summary: USA: With the US continuing to suffer shortages of lower GWP refrigerant R454B, Carrier has announced that it is now fulfilling R454B refrigerant orders within two weeks from time of order.

Title: Daikin Europe opens €140m R&D centre
Summary: BELGIUM: After two and a half years of construction, Daikin’s €140m EMEA Development Centre (EDC) is now operational.

Title: Modine opens Chennai factory
Summary: USA: Modine has officially opened its new 100,000ft2 factory in Chennai, India, to meet accelerated demand for data centre cooling across the APAC region.

Title: Vertiv buys data rack and cabinet company
Summary: UK/USA: Vertiv Holdings has successfully completed the $200m acquisition of Great Lakes Data Racks & Cabinets, a leading manufacturer of innovative data rack enclosures and integrated infrastructure solutions.

Title: LG cuts plastic use on 4-way cassette
Summary: SOUTH KOREA: LG Electronics is reducing plastic consumption and carbon emissions by adopting a new material and manufacturing process for its commercial 4-way system air conditioners.

Title: Lennox to acquire HVAC Division of NSI Industries
Summary: USA: Lennox has signed a definitive agreement to purchase the HVAC division of NSI Industries, a leading provider of electrical, HVAC, and network infrastructure product solutions, for approximately $550m.

Title: Over 600,000 minifridges recalled
Summary: USA: Over 600,000 Frigidaire-brand minifridges have been recalled in the USA after reports of short circuits causing more than $700,000 of property damage.

Title: AC users warned of risks after wildfires
Summary: SPAIN: With firefighters continuing to battle 14 major blazes across Spain, home and business owners are being advised of precautions to take with their air conditioning systems.

Title: Fourth person dies in New York LD outbreak
Summary: USA: A fourth person is reported to have died from the outbreak of legionnaires’ disease in New York City's Harlem neighbourhood.

Title: £250 promo on Panasonic Mini VRF
Summary: UK: Panasonic Heating and Cooling Solutions has introduced a new installer incentive to promote its ECOi Mini VRF outdoor units.

Title: Wolseley revamps Climate Centre branches
Summary: UK: Pipe Centre and Climate Centre says it has made a significant investment in five key UK branches in the last few months.

Title: BESA backs cooling for UK buildings
Summary: UK: The Building Engineering Services Association (BESA) is calling for urgent action to tackle overheating in buildings, as the UK experiences rising temperatures and heat-related deaths.

Title: Network Rail trials passive cooling system
Summary: UK: A new passive cooling system, currently being deployed in railway signalling cabinets to combat excessive heat, could improve the efficiency of commercial refrigeration cabinets.

Title: CTC adds high capacity R290 ATW heat pump
Summary: SWEDEN: CTC has announced the launch of the EcoAir 720M, the highest-capacity unit in its EcoAir 700M range of modulating air-to-water heat pumps.

Title: AI-powered wall-mount air conditioner
Summary: GERMANY: Midea Europe GmbH is launching Solstice, a new wall-mounted air conditioner that combines energy-efficiency with artificial intelligence.

Title: Daikin AHU meets healthcare demands
Summary: UK: Daikin Applied (UK) has unveiled the HTM-Pro T Series, a compact air handling unit designed to meet the stringent NHS HTM 03-01 ventilation guidelines for healthcare environments.

Title: Copeland scrolls for heat pump applications
Summary: USA: Copeland has announced two new variable-speed scroll compressor series for a wide range of commercial and residential heat pump applications.
